import React from 'react' import { Header, Image, Menu, Segment, Sidebar, Grid, Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react' import './Dashboard.css' import Timecard from './Timecard' import Schedule from './Schedule' import Clock from './Clock' import Error from './Error' class Dashboard extends React.Component { state = { active: 'schedule' } componentWillReceiveProps(props) { const { active } = this.props if (active !== this.state.active) { this.setState({ active }) } } renderActive() { switch (this.state.active) { case 'clock': return case 'timecard': return case 'schedule': return case 'history': return default: return } } render() { return (

) } } export default Dashboard
